data.title: Alone
data.meta_description: Jessica (Jules Willcox), a grief-stricken widow, flees the city in an attempt to cope with the loss of her husband.  When Jessica is kidnapped by a mysterious man and locked in a cabin in the Pacific Northwest, she escapes into the wilderness and is pursued by her captor.
data.text: Summary Jessica (Jules Willcox), a grief-stricken widow, flees the city in an attempt to cope with the loss of her husband. When Jessica is kidnapped by a mysterious man and locked in a cabin in the Pacific Northwest, she escapes into the wilderness and is pursued by her captor.
